name: .PUSH_DEVICEID File Extension
summary: Learn about .PUSH_DEVICEID files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A PUSH_DEVICEID file is a system file created on some Android devices. It contains a 32-byte hexadecimal value used to identify your device. PUSH_DEVICEID files are found in a user's data folder.

content: Upon installation, some Android apps create a PUSH_DEVICEID file and use it to identify your device. If you have not installed an app or library that uses PUSH_DEVICEID files, your device will not contain a PUSH_DEVICEID file.

instructions: PUSH_DEVICEID files are not meant to be opened. Editing your PUSH_DEVICEID file may cause apps to identify your device incorrectly.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
